welcome.subject: Welcome to Forest Courtyard
welcome.message: Thank you for registering on Forest Courtyard website. We are glad to welcome you to our hotel!

passwordReset.subject: Password Reset
passwordReset.message: You requested a password reset on Forest Courtyard website. Click the button below to create a new password.
passwordReset.warning: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
passwordReset.expiry: This link is valid for 24 hours.

bookingConfirmation.subject: Booking Confirmation #{{bookingId}}
bookingConfirmation.thankYou: Thank you for booking a room at Forest Courtyard hotel!
bookingConfirmation.cancellationPolicy: Cancellation policy: free cancellation 48 hours before arrival.
bookingConfirmation.questions: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

bookingCancellation.subject: Booking Cancellation #{{bookingId}}
bookingCancellation.message: Your booking at Forest Courtyard hotel has been successfully cancelled.
bookingCancellation.feedback: We would be happy to see you again in the future!

checkInReminder.subject: Upcoming Check-in Reminder for Forest Courtyard
checkInReminder.title: Upcoming Check-in Reminder
checkInReminder.reminder: We would like to remind you that your check-in date at Forest Courtyard hotel complex is approaching.
checkInReminder.instructions: Check-in is available from 2:00 PM. You'll need your passport and booking number for check-in.
checkInReminder.weather: Weather forecast for your stay period:
checkInReminder.activities: We've prepared various activities for you:
checkInReminder.contactInfo: If you have any questions or need to modify your booking, please contact us at +7 (498) 483-19-41 or reply to this email.

reviewRequest.subject: How was your stay at Forest Courtyard?
reviewRequest.title: Leave a Review About Your Stay
reviewRequest.request: We hope you had a great time at our hotel complex. We would appreciate if you could share your experience and leave a review.
reviewRequest.importance: Your opinion is very important to us and helps improve our service for future guests.
reviewRequest.thanks: Thank you for choosing Forest Courtyard and we hope to see you again!

bookingModification.subject: Booking Modification at Forest Courtyard
bookingModification.title: Your Booking has been Modified
bookingModification.modified: Your booking at Forest Courtyard hotel complex has been successfully modified according to your request.
bookingModification.contactInfo: If you have any questions or need additional information, please contact us at +7 (498) 483-19-41 or reply to this email.
